title: Marshall Field's type
content:
i am full of fail when it comes to attaching images for some reason...

[http://www.primaloftsale.com/images/Marshall%20Fields.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204123948/http:/www.primaloftsale.com/images/Marshall%20Fields.jpg "http://www.primaloftsale.com/images/Marshall%20Fields.jpg")

 [‹ Girl Guides of Canada Typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204123948/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37923 "Go to previous forum topic") [anyone know this font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204123948/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37948 "Go to next forum topic")
author: djfrantz

comments.content: grrr... not what i wanted to hear :D
I’m sorry. Do you need to re-create that specifically or are you just interested in the style?
also, that’s a really bad reproduction of the actual logo (says the chicago designer). looks like it was autotraced.
